SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ActualView, ControllerHandler, ControllerProvider, CommandObserver, ViewInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class TUI extends Object implements ActualView, CommandObserver, Observer
This class represents the Text User Interface. It setups and contains all the renderables as well as the logic to switch between them. It also contains the logic to handle the commands and the input.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • TUI

      public TUI()
      Creates a new TUI. It setups all the renderables by injecting the necessary dependencies and by setting the related commands. Each renderable is then attached to the states that it should be displayed in and is added to the list of renderables. Finally, the states startup prompts are set.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the TUI. It starts the input handler and sets the command display as active.
      Specified by:
      run in interface ActualView

    • transitionTo

      public void transitionTo(ViewState state)
      Transitions to a new view state. In doing so the terminal is cleared, the renderables and the commands are updated, the logger is rendered, the startup prompts are triggered and the command display is rendered. When transitioning to the same state, the view is refreshed.
      Specified by:
      transitionTo in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      state - The new view state to transition to.
